DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Dovrat et al 2018 JEcol - Plant height growth data
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: The table contains the data for all four species of legumes and three experimental treatments. Data includes the height of each plant measured repetitively along the experimental period. First day of height sampling varies by species, according to the rate of initial growth.
